author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Robotic surgeons struggle with precisely controlling suture tension, which is critical to wound healing. Researchers developed a programmable slipknot that visually signals when the correct tension is reached, improving robotic suturing accuracy and reducing recovery times. 

Source Article: https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-025-03892-x
